name: Chaos Jazz
desc4: <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> and <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct> increases by 15%. While off-field, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</ct> DMG increases by 20%. When switching on-field, this buff continues for 5s, and this continuation effect can trigger once every 7.5s.
story: A Drive Disc with a steep learning curve that really tests users' understanding of Ether devices.
